attributes.action: Make Dyslexia Diagnostics Assessments available to children without the fight
attributes.additional_details:
Children Acts in place to protect children & their additional support needs, but still failure in the education system & even when parents asks for assessments/diagnostics tests we are judged & branded frustrated parents the education department don't like to label children In the professionals wording!!!

The last year has been very difficult one fighting, for what is right for my daughter & her needs.....fighting the battle with the education dept who don't get it but Health professionals do
attributes.background: I have personally experience in this matter I feel very strongly about fighting for what is right for children especially when Education depts are failing to support or acknowledged this learning difficulty nor have enough knowledge & understanding regards to dyslexia & peoples every day challenges

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to make it easier for children and parents to access Dyslexia Diagnostics Assessments.
